data.comment: The big names in today's match at Mapei Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Reggio Emilia.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Brescia at Mapei Stadium.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Sassuolo.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Brescia territory.
Throw-in for Brescia in the half of Sassuolo.
In Reggio Emilia, Sassuolo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Filip Djuricic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
Free kick Brescia.
Dimitri Bisoli of Brescia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Brescia have an attacking throw-in.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Domenico Berardi of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Brescia at Mapei Stadium.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Brescia's half.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brescia in their own half.
Can Brescia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
Can Brescia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Mapei Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Domenico Berardi, who is down injured.
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo is back on the field again.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brescia's Dimitri Bisoli has been booked in Reggio Emilia.
Brescia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
At Mapei Stadium, Filippo Romagna has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Mario Balotelli (Brescia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Brescia in the half of Sassuolo.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Gregoire Defrel.
Throw-in for Brescia in their own half.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
Mario Balotelli for Brescia drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Brescia pushes forward through Mario Balotelli, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
Brescia to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brescia close to the penalty box.
Rogerio for Sassuolo has been booked by Gianluca Manganiello and receives a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Gregoire Defrel. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Brescia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brescia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Brescia push forward at Mapei Stadium and Jaromir Zmrhal gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Sassuolo defence.
Brescia drive upfield and Florian Aye gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Throw-in for Brescia at Mapei Stadium.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Goal kick for Brescia at Mapei Stadium.
The first-half has ended.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Francesco Caputo.
Great play from Gregoire Defrel to set up the goal.
The second-half is underway in Reggio Emilia.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Brescia in their own half.
Sassuolo are caught offside.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) gets in a strike – but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Ball goes out of play for a Brescia goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Important block from the Brescia defence as Rogerio fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
Brescia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The home team have replaced Jeremy Toljan with Mert Muldur. This is the second substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
Free kick Brescia.
Manuel Locatelli (Sassuolo) gets a yellow card.
Brescia's Mario Balotelli misses with an attempt on goal.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Diego Lopez is making the team's first substitution at Mapei Stadium with Ernesto Torregrossa replacing Florian Aye.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Brescia in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Balotelli (Brescia) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Sassuolo extend their lead to 2-0 through Francesco Caputo.
Mehdi Bourabia instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo are coming forward and Manuel Locatelli gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Brescia a goal kick.
Brescia make their second substitution with Simon Skrabb replacing Dimitri Bisoli.
Sassuolo drives forward and Francesco Caputo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sassuolo are pushing forward but Filip Djuricic's finish is wide of the goal.
Brescia have a goal kick.
Gianluca Manganiello waits before resuming play because Mehdi Bourabia for Sassuolo is still down.
Jeremie Boga hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Reggio Emilia for Sassuolo.
Ball safe as Brescia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mehdi Bourabia is back on his feet again.
Attention is being given to Sassuolo’s Filippo Romagna and play has been suspended briefly.
Filippo Romagna, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Marlon is the substitute for Sassuolo.
Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Brescia at Mapei Stadium.
Goal! Sassuolo extend their lead to 3-0 through Jeremie Boga.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
The away team replace Mario Balotelli with Alfredo Donnarumma.
Jeremie Boga of Sassuolo is pulled up for offside.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo's Jeremie Boga gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brescia defender.
Brescia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brescia are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Sassuolo.
Stefano Sabelli (Brescia) has received a yellow card from Gianluca Manganiello.
Sassuolo's Jeremie Boga has run offside.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Brescia's half.
Filip Djuricic (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Brescia.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
